text: (Napiye!) Nir kurum; "allah natinalanri nan enakke yatoru nanmaiyo allatu timaiyo ceytu kolla caktiyillatavan; maraintiruppavarrai nan aripavanaka iruntal nam'maikalai atikamakat tetikkontiruppen; (annilaiyil evvitamana) tinkum ennait tintiyiratu - nampikkai kollum makkalukku nan accamutti eccarikkai ceypavanum, nanmarayam kurupavanumeyanri verillai
